title: Contacts merging not correct
content:
I've 3 GSuite accounts, WhatsApp & Telegram.
Contacts in GSuite accounts are full synchronised ower contactsplus.com.

I have some problem with this device:
not all contacts were merged correctly between GSuite accounts - about 15-20 from 1200 not merge (all frequently used)
Pixel merging WhatsApp/Telegram contact with not merged GSuite contacts randomly, for example, Contact1(GSuite1) merged with WhatsApp, but Contact2(GSuite3) merged with WhatsApp.
Sometimes on incoming call I see contact without a photo, I think this is a corporate directory contact but not my contact.

Pixel provides a merge action in the menu only if contacts from the same account.

HOW CAN I MANUALLY MERGE CONTACTS FROM DIFFERENT ACCOUNTS AND CORPORATE DIRECTORY?
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 4 XL
